I bought a leather jacket from here and I am really pleased with it, I really enjoyed the whole experience in the shop from start to finish. I walked past the shop and spotted a jacket that looked good and was greeted by two friendly girls. I had no intention of buying the jacket but was assured that if I had one made it would be as good if not better than the one on display. I was a bit suspicious but they were so enthusiastic I went with it. The girl was really excited to show me the quality of the leathers they used so I went upstairs to see some people working away and check what they had and it seemed really nice. So they told me how much it would be, I didn - t agree to anything but was really excited about the jacket by this point. She said I could pick out the leather so I would be happy with the quality. We hopped on a scooter and went to a shop to pick out a hide. The first shop didn - t have one that I liked  - combination of the right quality and colour -  she agreed with me so we went to another shop and found a hide that I was really happy with, she showed me examples of good leather and bad leather. So we hopped back onto the scooter and went to another shop to get measured and pick out an inner lining. At this point everything seemed to be really fun and we agreed on a price. I made it really clear that I was trusting them to do a good job and that I wasn - t going to haggle on the price too much if they could make a really good jacket. I paid upfront for my impulse buy as I was confident in them and then went back to the hotel. When I got back I read some reviews on here and started to worry, I thought I had made a big mistake especially as I had already paid. But I trusted the girls to deliver so when I went to check the jacket the next day I was really pleasantly surprised. It looked better than the one on display, I scrutinised the stitches and they seemed to be great. There were a couple that I pointed out that were fixed in no time. I had it adjusted twice and by the end had it just the way I wanted, so I was really happy! Afterwards I asked her about her reviews and she did say that some people try to haggle lots and that she will do things at a cheaper price but when it comes to quality you pay for what you get. My recommendation is to bear this in mind, I made it really clear I wanted quality and she delivered. I asked her to also make a simple leather bag for me as a gift which she made really quickly afterwards. Although I didn - t have any experience buying shoes here I would recommend their jackets, I would advise to go with a pattern they already are used to making like the ones on display but she said she would make anything if she had a picture so if you have something specific in mind make sure you have detailed pictures. With all the shops in hoi an try not to pay up front, put a deposit in cash if you can, understand that they have to buy the materials and they are taking a risk too if you dont pay. I took a chance and was really pleasantly surprised but when I saw the reviews I thought I would regret paying upfront. The girls are really fun, just be friendly and work with them. Really pay attention to detail in the quality of the clothes because its easy to get swept up in their enthusiasm.Read more

Một trong số họ thậm chí còn nói với tôi rằng tôi phải sống chung với nó vì tôi khó ăn. Tôi nghĩ đó là lý do tại sao cô ấy đo lượng thức ăn của tôi.  Sai.  Sau khi tôi hơi tức giận, họ nói với tôi rằng họ sẽ sửa chữa.  Vào buổi tối, đôi giày bây giờ vẫn như cũ với rất nhiều xi bóng ở mặt trước.  Tôi nói với cô ấy rằng đây là việc làm tồi tệ và cô ấy thậm chí còn bắt đầu la hét với tôi và lao xuống đất.  Ở đó tôi thấy rằng - những chỉnh sửa - được thực hiện chỉ làm trầy xước phần đế của đôi giày. Vì thế xin đừng tới đây.
